DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the impact of obesity surgery on chronic inflammation.
DOC.detailed_description: A retrospective study to compare the impact of laparoscopic sleeve gastrectomy (LSG), laparoscopic Roux-en Y- gastric bypass (LRYGB) and laparoscopic omega-loop gastric bypass (LOLGB) on chronic inflammation and metabolic syndrome.
DOC.criteria: BMI > 35kg/m² and obesityrelated disease or BMI > 40kg/m² acute inflammation during laboratory examination
